# Test Gemini conversation
env GEMINI_API_KEY=test_key

# Build the example app
go build -o aistudio.exe ./example
exists aistudio.exe

# Test non-interactive conversation - should return a greeting response
# Note: This uses the recorded HTTP responses when not in record mode
exec ./aistudio.exe --non-interactive -p "Hello, how are you today?"
stdout 'Hello'

# Clean up
rm aistudio.exe
